subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: The United States defeated South Korea, 2-0, on Saturday to open its 2014 schedule, but the most important element is what Coach Jurgen Klinsmann learns from the game.
snippet: The United States defeated South Korea, 2-0, on Saturday to open its 2014 schedule, but the most important element is what Coach Jurgen Klinsmann learns from the game.
